--create topic test_topic 1000;

test_stream :=
(bridge from
    test_topic
    partitions = 1000
    props = ()
) -> (store stream);
OK

--load data dataset_1;

(scan all from test_stream) -> (sort by key);
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| offset               | event_time                 | key                 | hdrs                | val                 |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:01:05.123000 | key01               | .                   | val01               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:02:05.000000 | key02               | .                   | val02               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:03:05.000000 | key03               | .                   | val03               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:04:05.000000 | key04               | .                   | val04               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:05:05.000000 | key05               | .                   | val05               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:06:05.000000 | key06               | .                   | val06               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:07:05.000000 | key07               | .                   | val07               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:08:05.000000 | key08               | .                   | val08               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:09:05.000000 | key09               | .                   | val09               |
| 0                    | 2006-01-02 15:10:05.000000 | key10               | .                   | val10               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
10 rows returned

delete(test_stream);
OK

--delete topic test_topic;
